com.intuitiv.campus.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intuitiv.campus.controller.AbstractController
      • com.intuitiv.campus.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
@SessionAttributes(value="userSession")
@RequestMapping(value="/user")
public class UserController
extends AbstractController
    UserController route every action made from the "User" page
    Author:
    Meidi

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView userLogin(@ModelAttribute(value="email")
                                                                    java.lang.String email,
                                                                    @ModelAttribute(value="password")
                                                                    java.lang.String password)
                                                       throws CampusException
        Connect the user into the application if he's authorized
        Parameters:
        email - : the entered email as a login from the view
        password - : the entered password for the provided email from the view
        Returns:
        ModelAndView object
        Throws:
        CampusException - if there's an error with the connection

      • userSubscribe

        @RequestMapping(value="/subscribe",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView userSubscribe(@ModelAttribute(value="userForm")
                                                                                     User userForm,
                                                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
                                                           throws CampusException
        User subscription route method
        Parameters:
        userForm - : the user's informations entered in the web form
        bindingResult - : detect validations errors in the user's inputs
        Returns:
        ModelAndView object
        Throws:
        CampusException - if there's an error with the subscription
